Professional website design and development for businesses in Limassol, Cyprus. Local expertise, global standards.

Looking for a web designer in Limassol? You've come to the right place. We're a local web design agency that understands the Limassol business community. From the bustling tourist areas along the coast to the commercial heart of the city, we've helped businesses of all sizes establish their online presence.

Limassol is Cyprus's business hub — home to international companies, thriving tourism, and a growing tech scene. Your website needs to reflect that energy and professionalism. We create websites that not only look great but actually help you attract customers and grow your business.

Frequently Asked Questions

How much does a website cost in Limassol?

Our website packages start from €500 for a simple business site. Most Limassol businesses choose our Business package at €1,200 which includes custom design, SEO optimization, and ongoing support. View our full pricing.

Can we meet in person to discuss my project?

Absolutely! We're based in Limassol and happy to meet at your office, a local café, or our workspace. We find that face-to-face meetings help us better understand your business and create a website that truly fits your needs.

How long does it take to build a website?

A typical business website takes 2-3 weeks from start to finish. If you need something faster, we can often accommodate rush projects. E-commerce sites and more complex projects may take 3-4 weeks.

Will my website show up when people search for businesses in Limassol?

Yes! We optimize every website for local search. This includes setting up your Google Business Profile, adding location-specific content, and implementing technical SEO best practices. Our goal is to help you rank for searches like "your service + Limassol."
